summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2005 HITCHHIKER DISCOVERY DOMETIC REFRIGERATOR.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE REFRIGERATOR HAS BEEN LEAKING COOLANT AND FAILED.  THERE  WAS  RECALL # 06E076000  REGARDING EQUIPMENT:RECREATIONAL VEHICLE, BUT DOMETIC STATED THAT THE REFRIGERATOR WAS  EXCLUDED.*AK

DT*:  THE CONTACT OWNS A 2005 HITCHHIKER DISCOVERY TOUR COACH.   AFTER VACATION IN APRIL 2005 THE VEHICLE WAS INSPECTED AND THE CONTACT NOTICED THE UNDERSIDE OF THE FRAME WAS RUSTING.  THE VEHICLE SPENDS THE WINTER TIME IN TEXAS, NOT A SALT BELT STATE.  THE DEALERSHIP AND MANUFACTURER WERE CONTACTED AND REQUEST THE VEHICLE BE TAKEN TO THE MANUFACTURER, 700 MILES AWAY, FOR REPAIRS.  *AK  UPDATED 3/9/2006 - *NM
